main.name: Vinson Ly
main.description: mostly interested in the Cloud, FinTech and the Blockchain industry, with many relevant projects under my belt. I am currently seeking for a software engineering related internship position, starting in January 2018. If you would like to chat, feel free to reach out at any one of my social outlets below
main.bio: I'm an outgoing, aspiring Software Engineer with a passion for developing products that have real-world impact. I am most experienced with web development, using React and NodeJS. I have a huge interest in Blockchain and Cryptocurrencies and am currently serving as the President of the SFU Cryptocurrency Club. I am interested in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning and am excited to see how these revolutionary technologies will shape the future of the world. If we share any common interests, please feel free to react out on LinkedIn and we can chat!
main.contactmessage: If you would like to get in contact with me, please fill out the form and I will email you back at my earliest convienience.

resume.skillmessage: I am well versed in Web Development and am actively learning everyday to broaden my knowledge on Data Analytics and Blockchain Technology

education.description: A program that focuses on the development of high-quality software for the public and private industry.

work.title: Full Stack & AI Developer (Coop)
work.description: I was responsible for developing new features, resolving bugs, and refactoring code for the Porton Health Telemedicine Web App. I revamped the live session chat feature using React and WebRTC. Addiitonally, I optimized the performance of the web app, whilst converting the front-end architecture from Blaze to React.

extracurriculars.title: Cofounder & President
extracurriculars.description: I manage and oversee the operations of the club and host workshops and events for the club members and other students at SFU.

extracurriculars.org: Scouts Canada (99th SFX East Vancouver Scout Group)
extracurriculars.title: Colony Section Head
extracurriculars.description: I manage and oversee the operations of the Colony Section in the 99th East Vancouver SFX Scout Group. I plan events, run meetings, and host workshops for over 50 registered youth in the Scout group.

projects.title: Savour
projects.category: A decentralized food-sharing marketplace that allows home-cooks to list their delicious home-cooked meals in a trustless, decentralized manner. Payments are fulfilled using our decentralized escrow service, built with Ethereum Smart Contracts

projects.title: Coinbay - Classifieds Listing Web App
projects.category: A classifieds listing web app with custom built-in Ethereum blockchain cryptocurrency payment and escrow solution. Our custom Ethereum Smart Contract prevents users from bailing after a deal and allows sellers to sell with confidence. Deployed to AWS.

projects.title: Savor - Budget Tracker & Lifestyle Web App
projects.category: A budget tracker app that syncs with the user's bank account, providing hassle free budget tracking.

projects.title: Cryptocurrency Trading Bot
projects.category: An automated cryptocurrency trading bot, built with NodeJS to automatically place buy and sell orders, using a custom technical analysis algorithm.

projects.title: Personal Website
projects.category: A personal website built using ReactJS

projects.title: SFU Cryptocurrency Club Website
projects.category: The official website for the SFU Cryptocurrency Club
